mapper.sql: FROM ( ( SELECT PB.f_pay_time, 1 'type' FROM t_pay_bill PB WHERE PB.t_real_room_f_id = #{realRoomId} AND PB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND ( PB.f_is_pay = 1 OR IFNULL(PB.f_finance_status, 0) = 1 ) ) UNION ( SELECT _EO.f_pay_time f_pay_time, 2 'type' FROM t_ebuy_order _EO INNER JOIN t_ebuy_order_relation _EOR ON _EO.f_id = _EOR.f_sub_id AND _EOR.f_sys0_del_state = 0 WHERE _EO.f_buyer_id = #{userId} AND _EO.f_type = 4 AND _EO.f_pay_status = 2 AND _EO.f_sys0_del_state = 0 ) ) _t GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(_t.f_pay_time, '%Y-%m')

AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT _t.f_pay_time, MIN(_t.f_pay_time) f_pay_time_min, MAX(_t.f_pay_time) f_pay_time_max, GROUP_CONCAT(_t.type) types
ORDER BY _t.f_pay_time DESC LIMIT #{_begin}, #{_length} ) t WHERE ( OBJ.f_pay_time BETWEEN t.f_pay_time_min AND t.f_pay_time_max ) AND LOCATE(_type.type, types) > 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( GB.f_name, '月卡(元)' ) title, cast( CNPL.f_fee / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) amount, CONCAT( CNPL.f_pay_num, '个月月卡费' ) `desc`, PM.f_tel tel, cast( CNL.f_fee / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) carFee, CNL.t_car_num carNum, DATE_FORMAT( CNPL.f_pay_end_date, '%y.%m.%d' ) expire, CONCAT(CNPL.f_pay_num, '个月') `month`, CONCAT(GB.f_name, '停车场') parking, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( IFNULL(CSB.f_amount_bt, 0) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) bankDiscount, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( IFNULL(PC.f_amount, 0) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) hbAmt, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( ( IFNULL(EO.f_total_coupon_amount, 0) - IFNULL(PC.f_amount, 0) ) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) jfqDiscount, EO.f_pay_method payMethod, DATE_FORMAT( EO.f_pay_time, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i' ) payTime FROM t_ebuy_order EO INNER JOIN t_car_num_pay_log CNPL ON CNPL.t_ebuy_order_id = EO.f_id INNER JOIN t_car_num_list CNL ON CNL.f_id = CNPL.t_car_num_id INNER JOIN t_group_building GB ON GB.f_id = CNL.t_group_building_f_id LEFT JOIN t_cash_sqpay_bt CSB ON CSB.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EO.f_id LEFT JOIN t_property_management PM ON PM.f_id = GB.t_property_management_f_id LEFT JOIN t_pay_coupon PC ON PC.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EO.f_id AND PC.f_sys0_del_state = 0 WHERE EO.f_id = #{orderId} LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT(PBT.f_name, '账单(元)') title, cast( PB.f_amount / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) amount, CONCAT( date_format(PB.f_bill_month_start,'%m'), '-', date_format(PB.f_bill_month_end,'%m'), '月', PBT.f_name ) `desc`, PM.f_tel tel, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( IFNULL(CSB.f_amount_bt, 0) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) bankDiscount, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( IFNULL(PC.f_amount, 0) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) hbAmt, CONCAT( '￥ ', IFNULL( cast( ( IFNULL(PB.f_amount, 0) - IFNULL(PB.f_succ_pay_amount, 0) - IFNULL(PC.f_amount, 0)-IF(PB.f_finance_status = 1, IFNULL(PB.f_dedu_price,0), 0) ) / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ), 0 ) ) jfqDiscount, PB.f_payment_way payMethod, DATE_FORMAT( PB.f_pay_time, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i' ) payTime, RPAD( LEFT (PP.f_name, 1), CHAR_LENGTH(PP.f_name), '*' ) proprietorName, CONCAT( GB.f_name, '-', B.f_name, '-', IFNULL(f_num_tail, '') ) payAddress, PB.f_last_unpaid lastUnpaid, PDF.f_name billName, PDF.f_mr_name mrName, CONCAT( '￥ ', cast( PDF.f_total_price / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) ) billAmount, cast( PDF.f_total_price / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) amountBigDecimal, MPBR.f_start_value startValue, MPBR.f_end_value endValue, PDF.f_fee_type feeType FROM t_pay_bill PB INNER JOIN t_pay_bill_type PBT ON PBT.f_id = PB.f_bill_type_id INNER JOIN t_real_room RR ON RR.f_id = PB.t_real_room_f_id LEFT JOIN t_building B ON B.f_id = RR.t_building_f_id LEFT JOIN t_group_building GB ON GB.f_id = B.t_group_building_f_id LEFT JOIN t_property_proprietor PP ON PP.f_id = PB.f_property_proprietor_id LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order_has_t_pay_bill EOPB ON EOPB.t_pay_bill_f_id = PB.f_id AND EOPB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_ebuy_order EO ON EO.f_id = EOPB.t_ebuy_order_f_id AND EO.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_cash_sqpay_bt CSB ON CSB.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EO.f_id LEFT JOIN t_property_management PM ON PM.f_id = GB.t_property_management_f_id LEFT JOIN t_pay_coupon PC ON PC.t_ebuy_order_f_id = EO.f_id AND PC.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_property_fee_detail PDF ON PDF.t_pay_bill_f_id = PB.f_id AND PDF.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_mr_pay_bill_record MPBR ON MPBR.t_property_fee_detail_f_id=PDF.f_id AND MPBR.f_sys0_del_state=0 WHERE PB.f_id = #{payBillId} AND PB.f_sys0_del_state = 0 ORDER BY PDF.f_fee_type ASC, PDF.f_id DESC

SELECT CONCAT( PBT.f_name, '账单' ) title, cast( PB.f_amount / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) amount, CONCAT( IF ( PB.f_cycle_type = 1, PB.f_bill_month_size, TIMESTAMPDIFF( MONTH, DATE_FORMAT( PB.f_bill_month_end, '%Y-%m-01' ), DATE_FORMAT( PB.f_bill_month_start, '%Y-%m-01' ) ) + 1 ), '个月', PBT.f_name ) `desc`, PM.f_tel tel, RPAD( LEFT (PP.f_name, 1), CHAR_LENGTH(PP.f_name), '*' ) proprietorName, CONCAT(GB.f_name, ' ',B.f_name, '-', IF(RR.f_unit_name is null,'', concat(RR.f_unit_name, '-')), RR.f_num_tail) payAddress, PB.f_last_unpaid lastUnpaid, PDF.f_name billName, PDF.f_mr_name mrName, CONCAT( '￥ ', cast( PDF.f_total_price / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) ) billAmount, cast( PDF.f_total_price / 100 AS DECIMAL (28, 2) ) amountBigDecimal, gbbc.f_is_collect_arrears collectionArrearsType, MPBR.f_start_value startValue, MPBR.f_end_value endValue, PDF.f_fee_type feeType FROM t_pay_bill PB INNER JOIN t_pay_bill_type PBT ON PBT.f_id = PB.f_bill_type_id INNER JOIN t_real_room RR ON RR.f_id = PB.t_real_room_f_id INNER JOIN t_group_building_bill_cycle gbbc on gbbc.f_id = PB.t_bill_cycle_id LEFT JOIN t_building B ON B.f_id = RR.t_building_f_id LEFT JOIN t_group_building GB ON GB.f_id = B.t_group_building_f_id LEFT JOIN t_property_proprietor PP ON PP.f_id = PB.f_property_proprietor_id LEFT JOIN t_property_management PM ON PM.f_id = GB.t_property_management_f_id LEFT JOIN t_property_fee_detail PDF ON PDF.t_pay_bill_f_id = PB.f_id AND PDF.f_sys0_del_state = 0 LEFT JOIN t_mr_pay_bill_record MPBR ON MPBR.t_property_fee_detail_f_id=PDF.f_id AND MPBR.f_sys0_del_state=0 WHERE PB.f_id=#{payBillId} ORDER BY PDF.f_fee_type ASC, PDF.f_id DESC

choose.when: SELECT sum(ifnull(pb.f_dedu_price, 0)) FROM t_ebuy_order_relation eor INNER JOIN t_ebuy_order_has_t_pay_bill eopb ON eor.f_sub_id = eopb.t_ebuy_order_f_id AND eor.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND eor.f_sub_type = 2 INNER JOIN t_pay_bill pb ON eopb.t_pay_bill_f_id = pb.f_id AND pb.f_finance_status = 1 AND pb.f_dedu_price > 0 AND pb.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND eopb.f_sys0_del_state = 0 WHERE eor.f_parent_id = #{id}
choose.otherwise: SELECT pb.f_dedu_price FROM t_pay_bill pb WHERE pb.f_id = #{id} AND pb.f_finance_status = 1 AND pb.f_dedu_price > 0 AND pb.f_sys0_del_state = 0

mapper.select: SELECT pb.f_id payBillId, cast((pb.f_amount - IFnull(pb.f_dedu_price, 0))/100 AS DECIMAL(28,2)) billRelAmt, DATE_FORMAT(gbbc.f_bill_month_start, '%y.%m') billMonthStart, concat(DATE_FORMAT(gbbc.f_bill_month_start, '%m'), '-', DATE_FORMAT(gbbc.f_bill_month_end, '%m'), '月', pbt.f_name, '欠费') billTypeName FROM t_property_fee_detail_unpaid fdu INNER JOIN t_pay_bill pb ON pb.f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND pb.f_id = fdu.t_unpaid_pay_bill_id INNER JOIN t_group_building_bill_cycle gbbc on gbbc.f_id = pb.t_bill_cycle_id inner join t_pay_bill_type pbt on pbt.f_id = gbbc.t_pay_bill_type_id WHERE fdu.t_pay_bill_id = #{_parameter} AND pb.f_is_pay = 2 order by gbbc.f_bill_month_start
